item.title: Global Trade Turmoil: The Ripple Effects of Tariff Wars and Pathways to Stability
item.description: The global economy is reeling from the seismic shockwaves of the Trump administration’s April 2025 tariff announcement, which imposed a 10% baseline levy on nearly all U.S. imports and escalated rates up to 54% for key trading partners like China123. This protectionist pivot—the most aggressive since the Smoot-Hawley Tariff Act of 1930—has ignited fears of a prolonged trade war, stagflation in advanced economies, and acute hardship for developing nations456. As markets plummet and retaliatory measures multiply, this report examines the crisis through historical, economic, and policy lenses, offering actionable solutions to mitigate collateral damage.
